내가 해본 게임 중 한 손 안에 들 만큼 재밋게 했던 게임
진행방식, 조작, 완성도 등 모든 것에 만족하며 즐길 수 있었다.
스팀 입문 게임이 이 게임이었는데 너무 재밌어서 포탈1도 바로 구매하여 클리어하고
무료 DLC모드인 Thiking with Timemachine도 바로 클리어했다.
또 다른 유명한 DLC 모드인 MEL도 하려 했으나 이상하게 MEL만은 너무 어지러워서 포기

두뇌게임이라는 기본 방식에 충실하여 이 부분은 타이밍을 맞추어 아슬아슬하게 움직여야 클리어하겠구나 하는 방식은 올바른 해답이 아니다. 항상 정답은 별다른 피지컬 없이 클리어할 수 있게 만들어 놓았다.

처음에는 그냥 할만한 게임 정도로 느껴지지만 맵이 넓어지고 나서가 진정한 꿀잼의 시작

본 스토리 자체는 8시간가량이면 끝나지만 게임 하나로 스토리모드, 친구와 함께하는 모드, 왠만한 유료게임 이상의 완성도와 재미를 보이는 DLC모드 2개를 모두 즐길 수 있다면 전혀 돈이 아깝지 않을 것이다.

밸브의 개발 이념에 맞는 최고의 참신함을 가지면서도 재미를 잃지 않은 명작

후속작이 나오길 바랄 뿐이다

10/10 - IGN
ГЛАДУСИК

[b][i]Zwei größenwahnsinnige KIs , eine Taubstumme und ein gigantisches Labyrinth aus Testkammern.[/i][/b]


[h1]Die Story:[/h1]

Portal 2 ist eine mehr als nur gelungene Fortsetzung zum ersten Teil. Im zweiten Teil wacht Chell, die Protagonistin, nach einiger Zeit aus einem Hyperschlaf auf, nachdem sie von der gewaltigen Explosion in Teil 1 völlig weggetreten ist.

Zu Beginn versucht Wheatly, eine der beiden KIs, uns aus der Anlage rauszuholen, führt uns aber direkt ins Gehirn von GLADoS, die KI welche wir im ersten Teil vernichten mussten, und lässt sie uns wieder reaktivieren.

Alles scheint wie früher doch nachdem wir GLADoS ein weiteres Mal besiegt haben übernimmt Wheatly die Anlage und stellt sich gegen uns.

Durch diesen Plot-Twist bekommt das Spiel nochmal einen ordentlichen Spannungs-Boost was mich dann insgesamt auf 7/10 Punkte bringt.


[h1]Das Gameplay:[/h1]

Zur Bewältigung des Spiel haben wir exakt 2 Waffen zur Verfügung: Unser Gehirn und eine Portal-Waffe.
Durch geschickte Platzierung von Portalen müssen wir uns durch verschiedene sogenannte Testkammern kämpfen.

Ich bin allgemein ein riesen Puzzle-Game Fan und habe von eben dieser Sorte schon einige Spiele gespielt.
Doch Portal bietet eine Menge Features, die andere Spiele aus diesem Genre nicht bieten.
Alles in allem ist es die beste Kombination aus Platformer und Puzzle-Game, die ich je gesehen habe.

Für das Gameplay gebe ich satte 9/10 Punkte.


[h1]Meine Bewertung:[/h1]

[b]Pro[/b]
[list]
[*]Zusätzlicher CO-OP
[*]Volle Controller-Unterstützung
[*]Einfach bedienbarer Level-Editor
[*]Hintergrunderzählungen zu "Aperture Science"
[/list]

[b]Kontra[/b]
[list]
[*]Teilweise zu einfache Level
[*]Die Story endet :P
[/list]


[h1]Mein Fazit:[/h1]

Das Spiel ist insgesamt betrachtet für mich eine absolut sichere 9/10. Alles was zur vollen 10 fehlen würde wäre eine längere Story.


[i]Dieses Review wurde als Wertung innerhalb des eigenen Genres verfasst.

Wenn euch das Review gefallen hat, folgt doch dem Review-Programm der [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/-German_Gamer_Community-]German Gamer Community.[/url][/i]

Pros:
-The story is simple, but yet has so many unknown mysteries and complexities. It really depends on how much you explore and try to piece it all together, which is something I love in a game.
-GLaDos once again brings all her lovable charm along with other new characters that make me appreciate the Portal series even more.
-Valve does something I wish other game companies would: "If it ain't broke don't fix it." The gameplay of Portal is it's crowning achievement and not only did Valve keep it same from the first Portal, they perfected and improved it. 
- Co-op is something that I always thought would be perfect for Portal and Valve did not dissappoint. You haven't truely completed Portal 2 until you've played co-op, it is amazing. 

Cons:
-While I do love the subtle mysteries in the story, I do wish the game would expand on them more. Sometimes I feel like there are so many unanswered questions that it's frustrating. 

Overall:
Portal 2 does exactly what I think sequels should always do: be better than the first one. Which is something incredible that Valve has achieved since the first Portal was so good. Portal 2 is a wonderful experience that combines a serious plot with super fun gameplay and the wonderful characters put a bow on top of it all. Not only is the single player great, but the co-op is equally as good. 

Please, do yourself a favor and play Portal 2. (And the first one too)

Jos Portal oli pelimaailmalle jotain, mikä mullisti kaiken, on Portal 2 vielä hieman parempi. Tässä pelissä yhdistyy ennennäkemättömällä tavalla monipuoliset henkilöhahmot, ongelmanratkonta, musta huumori, yhteistyö ja ennen kaikkea vanha vastaikkainasettelu. Tämä on pelikokemus jonka tahtoo elää aina vain uudestaan! Jos sattuu kyllästymään yksinpeliin, voi pelata yhteistyöpeliä, ja jos sekään ei hotsita, niin yhteisön kammiot jaksavat aina yllättää. [h1]TL;DR: Get the 2-pack, it's worth it.[/h1]

Portal 2 and the series as a whole are fantastic games made with a simple idea:
You have a gun that makes a teleportation hole to put you somewhere else. You keep your velocity, angle, ect. when you go through it.

The single player is more of an expansion on the original, adding mechanics here and there to freshen it up.

The real fun is the multiplayer and the steam workshop. The campaign is pretty fun and has it's challenging moments, but the most fun I've had with this game is playing some workshot stuff with a friend. The levels users create can be anything from fully custom adventures with entirely new assets or something someone made in the in-game level creator.
(The best one we played was a pack called "The Order of Things", I forgot by whom.)

About the mechanics themselves...
When you hear the phrase "Thinking with Portals" you might just think it's just something they say becouse it's a puzzle game and it's in the title.
No, once you start playing portal, it becomes a part of how you think in the puzzles, and adding another player with their own portals makes it even more of an addition. You don't realize it, but you just start thinking and making new uses of the portals while they also teach you the mechanics (in the singleplayer) if you didn't get it.

The game's one of the best multiplayer puzzlers out there, so go grab the 2-pack and redirect lasers at your friends.

This game is wonderful.  If studies are correct, it even raises your IQ and boost performance in logic-based courses in academia.  Just play it for yourself, mang.  I love this game, and I have loved this game for a long time.  Why wouldn't I want to share it?  Yes, it has flaws, but it truly does shine as a game that is FPS that doesn't need you to shoot baddies or blow up objectives to keep you entertained.  It's fun by yourself, it's fun with a friend, and it will (if you like puzzles, that is) keep you busy and full of enjoyment for hours at a time if you let it.

这真的是一款非常需要玩家动脑筋的游戏，在如今这种快节奏的生活氛围中，这种类型的游戏很难抓住玩家的心了，然而在接触这款游戏后，我被我的耐心给吓到了，说实话，我的智力就是中等[strike] 偏下 [/strike]水平，经常在游戏里卡关，然而我从头到尾没有查过一次攻略，一卡就是二十分钟，但我一直没有放弃，这种感觉就好像在做高考模拟题的最后一题一样，不做出来誓不罢休。另外这款游戏也给了我十分的欢乐和惊喜，每一次卡关后突发灵感找到解决方法时，我都会为我能够想出这样的方法而吃惊，感到十分的满足感。一款游戏能够教我静下心来，给我惊喜、满足以及欢乐，这就够了，这对我来说，就是一款十足的好游戏！

Grałem w pierwszy Portal od razu po premierze w 2008. Od tego czasu przestałem grać w gry komputerowe sprzęt się zestarzał przesiadłem się na Macbooki. W Portala 2 zagrałem dopiero teraz w 2016 roku wpadając przypadkowo na niego w sklepie Steam. Nie sądziłem że teraz może coś tak bardzo przykuć mnie do ekranu. Ta gra jest absolutnie fenomenalna, świeża, wymagająca IQ wyższego niż temperatura pokojowa i piekielnie wciąga. W całym klimatycznym uniwersum jesteśmy tylko sami z dwoma robotami których dialogi są prześmiewcze, placówka Aperture ma doskonały klimat i jest świetnie zaprojektowana. Portalowe i żelowe zagadki są świetne a ich rozwiązywanie sprawia dużo frajdy. Grafika w ogóle się nie postarzała i czasami potrafiła mnie zaskoczyć. Gra bez problemu działa na Windowsie 10. Nie sądziłem że można zrobić sequel lepszy pod każdym względem lepszy od pierwowzoru. Jeśli nie grałeś w Portala 1 albo nie podobał Ci się odpuść ten tytuł jeśli na tekst "Cake Is a Lie" przypominają Ci się wszystkie obelgi GlaDOS'a to zapewniam - będziesz zachwycony.

Historia do jogo é muito bem elaborada, as mecanicas funcionam muito bem de acordo com historia. s dialogos do jog parecem de filme top, e ainda possui puzzles divertidissimos e que vão te deixar horas para resolver.Alem disso tem o modo coop que com um amigo fica sensacional
